entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
